name: adidas Yeezy Boost 350 V2 Black Red
detail: Please Note: Extra laces required. The Yeezy 700 V3 Arzareth welcomed a new wave of color for the ever-growing Yeezy line. Previous releases of the 700 V3 have stayed in neutral territory, making the Arzareth a stand out with its striking colorway.The Yeezy 700 V3 Arzareth features a blue and grey Primeknit upper that is complemented by a traditional translucent glow-in-the-dark cage overlay. From there, an EVA foam midsole, grey toe cap, and black lining complete the design.

name: adidas Yeezy 700 V3 Arzareth Primeknit

From there, an EVA foam midsole, grey toe cap, and black lining complete the design.

name: adidas Yeezy 500 High Tactile Orange
detail: The adidas Yeezy 500 High Tactile Orange arrives in a mix of mesh, leather, suede, and neoprene. Shades of brown make up the upper along with hits of navy and indigo on the overlays. A Tactile Orange adiprene sole wraps this hiking-inspired shoe.

name: adidas Yeezy Boost 700 MNVN Orange
detail: Yeezy introduced a new colorway to their 700 MNVN series with the adidas Yeezy Boost 700 MNVN Orange, now available on StockX. Although the silhouette is similar to previous models, this shoe differs by displaying “700” branding on the upper using compact materials.    This Yeezy Boost 700 MNVN is comprised of an orange nylon upper paired with reflective detailing. A solid black sole with Boost cushioning completes the design. These sneakers released in February of 2020 and retailed for $220.

name: adidas Yeezy Boost 700 Wave Runner Solid Grey
detail: A new set of waves are rolling in as the adidas Yeezy Wave Runner 700s get ready for their first restock on March 10th, 2018. First releasing in November of 2017, the Yeezy Boost 700’s represented what was a significant shift in Kanye’s design aesthetic, moving from the minimalistic silhouettes of early Yeezy seasons to this chunky runner model. It once again showed how Kanye stays ahead of the curve, as chunkier sneakers became more en vogue in 2018. The shoe features an upper with grey and black suede overlays, premium leather with blue mesh underlays, neon green laces, and its signature chunky midsole with encapsulated Boost technology. Translation: these may look bold but are still comfy as hell. The Yeezy Wave Runners will stay at the same retail cost of $300 for the upcoming restock, but have averaged a sale price well above retail on StockX since their initial drop. So if you’re looking to add these to your Yeezy collection, remember that fortune favors the bold bidders.

name: adidas Yeezy Boost 350 V2 Synth (Reflective)

adidas Yeezy Foam RNNR MX Cream Clay
detail: Following previous monochromatic Foam RNNR's, the adidas Yeezy Foam RNNR MX Cream Clay is the first Foam RNNR to feature a multicolor palette. Cream, clay, and grey colors are all prominent on the upper in a streaked camo pattern, making the design a true statement piece.
